detaileddescription.para: File is the name of a shared object file (called dynamic load library in MS-Windows) This file is attached to the current process and Handle is unified with a handle to the library Equivalent to open_shared_object(File, [], Handle) See also load_foreign_library/1 and load_foreign_library/2
On errors, an exception shared_object( Action, Message) is raised Message is the return value from dlerror()
